flag: <svg id="flag-svg" viewBox="0 0 150 100" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" baseProfile="full" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:ev="http://www.w3.org/2001/xml-events" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><defs><clipPath id="mask0"><rect height="100" width="150" x="0" y="0"></rect></clipPath></defs><g clip-path="url(#mask0)"><rect fill="#ff9932" height="100" stroke="none" width="150" x="0" y="0"></rect><path d="M0,0 L86.60254037844386,50.0 L0,100 z" fill="#ffce00" stroke="none"></path></g><g id="empty"></g></svg>
q1: Because orange is my favourite colour, and it is simple and minimalistic (as I try to be). Also, its' warm colours represent the warmth of Latin America's lands and the character of our people.
q2: I am bothered by being tired all the time, but I am happy to be able to have such amazing experiences all the time, meeting great people, and exploring such a different culture. Also the nice weather makes me insanely happy after my first long, dark, Balkan winter.
q3: A doctor in Anthropology and Ethnology, and specially a good person who can make people who surrounds me feel happy, cared for and supported (:
